properties.comment: Small form factor: devices smaller than tablet
properties.name: mqSmall

properties.comment: Medium form factor:  devices larger than phone
properties.name: mqMedium

properties.comment: Medium form factor, landscape:  devices larger than phone, in landscape orientation
properties.name: mqMediumLandscape

properties.comment: Large form factor:  devices larger than tablet
properties.name: mqLarge

properties.value: only screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), screen and (min-device-pixel-ratio: 2),screen and (min-resolution: 192dpi),screen and (min-resolution: 2dppx)
properties.name: mqHighRes

properties.comment: Make record layout 1 col when its view port is < 600px
properties.name: mqSingleColumnRecordLayout
